title: Lagg/no lagg/ then died
body:
So yesterday, and like may times over, i played a game and was super laggy coz high ping rates but yesterday YESTERDAY IT WAS SPECIAL!

I finished a game and it was perfect, 20 ping stable and everything was AWSOME! it was such a fun game and havent experienced a none laggy game in MONTHS! 20 PING FROM WHAT USUALLY IS A 4.5K PING! anyaws tht's not my point. 

My pint is, i finished my low priority que, which i received coz of stupid lagg, and then played tht none laggy game and ended up getting back my leadership badge thingand was so happy! but then the next game i played which was this morning, I BLOODY GOT STUCK ON LOADING SCREEN AFTER CHAMP SELECT ON 100% FOR HALF AN HOUR AND GOT INTO LOW PROITY QUE! QQ

can some1 pls tell me whats goiung on?

 y is riot hating me ?

replies.body:
You made a lot more sense when commenting on someone else's thread about the same thing.

But, yeah, effective it's Riot's side. If you want, send in a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and see if they can help you there. What ISP are you with?
